title: Global Shipping Lanes
description: Visualization of major maritime shipping routes across the globe, highlighting the density of traffic in key channels and ports.

title: Antarctic Ice Melt Rate
description: A chart showing the accelerated rate of ice melt in Antarctica over the past two decades, based on satellite gravity measurements.

title: US Air Traffic Analysis
description: A comprehensive dashboard detailing domestic air traffic patterns in the United States for the 2023 fiscal year.

title: Deforestation in the Amazon
description: A map comparing deforestation rates in the Amazon basin between 2010 and 2020, showing hotspots of agricultural expansion.

title: Global Internet Speeds
description: A choropleth map illustrating the average mobile and broadband internet speeds by country.

title: Renewable Energy Growth
description: Comparative bar charts showing the growth of solar, wind, and hydroelectric energy production in G20 nations since 2000.

title: Migration Patterns Europe
description: A flow map visualizing major migration routes into and within Europe over the last five years, indicating volume and primary corridors.

title: COVID-19 Case Distribution
description: An infographic breaking down the global distribution of COVID-19 cases by continent, with key metrics on vaccination rates.

title: Seismic Activity - Pacific Rim
description: A map plotting all seismic events greater than magnitude 4.0 around the Pacific Ring of Fire for the past year.

title: Popular Programming Languages
description: A dashboard from the latest developer survey showing trends in programming language popularity and developer salaries.

title: Agricultural Output by Region
description: A detailed breakdown of agricultural output, comparing crop yields for staple foods across different climate zones.

title: Urban Sprawl Simulation
description: A predictive model showing the projected urban sprawl of a major metropolitan area over the next 30 years.

title: Atlantic Hurricane Tracks
description: Composite image showing the tracks of all major hurricanes in the Atlantic basin during the 2022 season.

title: Supply Chain Network
description: A network graph illustrating the complexity of a global supply chain for consumer electronics, from raw materials to final delivery.

title: Social Media Usage Trends
description: An infographic analyzing demographic trends in social media platform usage, comparing user engagement across different age groups.
